website_summaries.verdict: A close contender to our top pick minus a few features. Choose this 12-cup coffee maker if you prefer to save a few dollars over having a programmable warming plate.
pros: Offers a feature set that's suitable for most coffee drinkers' needs, including a 12-cup capacity, programmable brewing function, and spiral showerhead
Has brew selector and easy-to-reach dual brew buttons
cons: Tank is removable, but it's also awkward to use and known to occasionally spring leaks

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bunn coffee pots for years, but the last one I had was very disappointing and I wanted a coffee pot with a removable water fill. This Kitchen Aide is probably the best coffee pot I've ever had - including the Bunn. Great purchase and the coffee is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many coffee makers during my 60+ years and this is the best I’ve ever owned. It is reasonably priced, attractively designed and works perfectly. My only reason for not giving it five stars (wish I could of given it a 4.9) is my fear of the water container breaking if dropped. It is constructed of a cheaper polycarbonate plastic that would certainly crack upon impact. Otherwise it’s a fine machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way its made cuz i have arthritis in my hands. Thanks for thinking of me. The price is worth it because it's so well made. It looks very nice in my kitchen. I love the clean gray color!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cute Coffee
customer_reviews.text: So cute and the coffee taste fabulous out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkdcc12

customer_reviews.title: Fits right in
customer_reviews.text: I love everything kitchenaide never disappointed! I'm doing a little update. I've had this coffee maker a few months now and I have Not experienced what others have. After cleaning it I did not get that plastic taste and the coffee pot itself isn't hard to clean with the rim piece, mine is still running great and doing its job! Kitchen aide does pretty well when it comes to their appliances I have to say. Not sure why others have issues. Hope this helps. And BTW I'm an all day coffee drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Tarbill

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It is an elegant looking unit that makes good coffee. Easy to use and clean. What else should you expect from $70 only? : )
customer_reviews.author: Super_G

customer_reviews.title: Warming function can NOT be reset
customer_reviews.text: While this coffee maker does make very good coffee, you are not able to restart the warming function without brewing more coffee. I will be returning it for the previous Kitchen Aid model.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK MANN

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. No steam. Great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the “chemical smell” reviews ward you off. Clean the water resivior before use and it won’t have a smell. It’s brand new plastic.. of course it smells funny. Makes great coffee, sleek, and little to no steam. Metal basket that’s reusable, brews somewhat fast. My only complaint is it doesn’t have a brew size selection. I’d love to make single cups of Togo coffee instead of a full pot every time. I circumvent this by just adding 4 cups of water to the resivior every morning. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love my new coffee maker. I labored over which one to purchase. I am so happy I got this one. I love the fact that it can sit flat against the wall and not stick out. The coffee is great!!! It is super simple to use. I set the timer at night and wake up to wonderful hot coffee in the morning. I love that it stays heated for two hours and then automatically shuts off! It is a great machine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The carafe leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice, but leaks when using it. The carafe drips. See the video. There doesn’t seem to be anything obstructing the flow or a defect. Seems like a design issue to me. I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker as long as you don't break the carafe
customer_reviews.text: It really is a great machine that produces high quality coffee. It has a warming plate timer that will prevent coffee from getting horribly burned, which is nice. The Bad Thing is that the carafe is not as durable as it should be and breaks pretty easily. I bumped mine on the counter top and the whole bottom shattered. That is when I found out that there is no replacement pot. Not on Amazon, and on the Kitchenaid website they are all "temporarily out of stock" and have been for...a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tars Tarkus

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I will never be without a removable water carafe again! Brew buttons on front and side allow you to make the most of your counter space. Easy to program. Brews great coffee. Only thing I would change is the color of the markings on the carafe - if you're vision impaired, the white on clear is hard to see. Recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sip!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally happy with my new coffee maker! I cleaned everything, did as recommended, then made a wonderful pot of coffee. I grind my own beans I almost replaced my bean grinding coffeemaker though I am more loyal to Kitchenaid then their competitor... I like that I don't have to pour water be find the machine, I'm disabled usually more water gets on the counter than in the maker, the shower head is very nice. I was instantly impressed when I took my first sip. I did get the black onyx to match my other kitchenaid products.
customer_reviews.author: ElizLamora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I almost bought a cheaper coffee maker from another brand but I’m so glad I went with this one. The timer feature always has my coffee ready for when I get done walking the dogs and the coffee itself is brewed perfectly. It’s easy to clean and refill too. I like that it doesn’t use paper filters so there’s less waste. The little handle things on the reusable filter are great for propping the lid open so everything can dry too.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes great coffee. What I really like is the removable water reservoir. You take it to the sink to fill & it at the faucet, instead of filling the pot & pouring into reservoir. I tried the gold filter for a month, but didn't like having to dump the grounds into the compost bucket. Without the paper filter the wet grounds are hard to get out of the ribs of the coffee holder, I always had to rinse the rest out & did not like them going down the drain. I have no problem with paper filters decomposing in my compost pile, so went back to paper.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot. The water reservoir being removable, and away from the filters, keeps grounds from getting in the water. The bold setting, actually, changes the brew time and makes for a very flavorful pot of coffee. Some might not like how much counter space it takes, as it is wider than most. Though, there is an option of setting it up, lengthwise, on the counter, access to the water reservoir, and controls (other than start/stop) are reduced. I had been looking for something more reasonably priced than the $100+ coffee makers out there, and the reviews on this were good. I am very happy with this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderfish

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Cuisinart coffee maker and was sooo disappointed. It leaked on the bottom and it kept dripping coffee on the counter when I poured a cup. The Kitchenaid coffee maker I purchased, I wished I would have purchased it a long time ago. The Kitchenaid brewing time is surprisingly quick and efficient, no drips or leaks it is everything I am looking for in a coffee maker. Good job Ka
customer_reviews.author: steven mann

customer_reviews.title: love this coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: KitchenAid makes the best products, including this coffee maker! The coffee taste great and it is easy to use. I do have a love/ hate relationship with the pot sizes. It is only me and my boyfriend who drink coffee, so we only need about 4 cups of coffee, which is the minimum you can make. However, sometimes I will make a larger pot and use the rest as iced coffee. It is also a great coffee pot if you have a lot of people or guests over. It's just not the best for individual cups or small quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: it's good, but I've had better
customer_reviews.text: It really is a good machine, it's just not the pourover model that Kitchen aid no longer makes. The pour over model made the BEST cup of coffee I've ever had, Every day! My old one developed a bad internal leak so i had to replace it. this was as close as i could find. easy to use, good coffee, just not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look and great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for approximately 1 week. My main reason for purchasing this particular coffee machine is that the water reservoir is separate from the rest of the machine. This allows the machine to dry quicker and won’t get grody and worn down over time from the constant moisture. Secondly, aesthetically this machine is amazing looking. It is super sleek and looks expensive. It brews a delicious pot of coffee. I’ve been using the reusable filter that comes with the pot and it’s been great. I also love that it has a “countdown” timer of when the hot plate automatically turns off. I’m super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: I've tried both black and grey models. Coffee tastes like glue. smells of epoxy.
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace the cuisinart, which I will once again repurchase Dozens of vinegar cycles could not get this to change. Plastic smells and leaches its stink into your coffee. Fool me once, shame on you......just go with the Cuisinart 14 cup
customer_reviews.author: ZZ81

customer_reviews.title: Much more plastic than it looks in the photos. Keeps coffee very hot, will scorch coffee when low
customer_reviews.text: Brewed fine, the coffee flavor was fine. The hot plate is VERY hot. If coffee got a little low in the pot it would scorch on the bottom of the pot quickly honestly, this was the deal-breaker for me. I did not think it was worth the price for an average brew. I was replacing my malfunctioning Ninja but ended up just going back to my basic red Hamilton Beach one I had in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Daron

customer_reviews.title: Makes a better cup of java*!*!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is "by far" has proven to make the best tasting coffee I've ever made. I thought all home brewing machines made (basically) the same tasting coffee. No! This machine makes a more robust tasting coffee...even with less grounds used in my previously owned makers. If you think all coffee makers are the same... they're not! I'm very happy with purchase. **Side note: I made my decision solely due to reviews left by others.
customer_reviews.author: Remark504

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, Fragile carafe! No replacements!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a month ago. I loved the coffee maker itself, but the glass carafe is very fragile! A small bump and mine broke. I figured I would atleast be able to find a replacement part, but kitchenaid had a furry of reviews on the replacement carafe claiming the same issue. In addition they have been unable to stock their replacement carafe. I would not recommend buying this unless you have a spare glass carafe. Otherwise you’ll be stuck spending $25-$35 on a replacement carafe that doesn’t even match the kitchenaid considering they can’t stock their own replacement carafes...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this KitchenAid coffeemaker. You dont have to add extra coffee to get a good cup of coffee. I also like the filter...no need for the paper ones. I would definitely buy this brand again. (We use, and swear by, 1850 coffee)
customer_reviews.author: Darlene L. Vartuli

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coffee maker. The reservoir being removable makes it easier to fill from out filtered water dispenser. ( I hate having to use the coffee pot to measure and fill). It’s easy to clean and makes lovely hot coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lj  Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Just ok coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot has limitations. After the two hour warm setting you cannot re-initialize the warm setting if you have coffee left in the pot - you have to start another brew cycle to do that. When you start your coffee at 5 o’clock in the morning and folks are getting up at 8 o’clock in the morning they’re facing cold coffee. The coffee basket will not come out from the front, you have to pull the coffee pot out from under your cabinets in order to use it. The water bucket is quite nice though!
customer_reviews.author: djlas

customer_reviews.title: Delicious brew!
customer_reviews.text: Great "Kitchenaid" style (balances the stand mixer on counter). The the brew is rich and THIS is the best part of waking up!
customer_reviews.author: jprodesigns

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid KCM1208DG NO replacement for carafe
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker; however, the lid will not come OFF!!! Very difficult to clean pot without hitting it against something - so far I haven't broken the pot when cleaning. I have a 40-year old KitchenAid mixer which I bought because my mothers mixer was 40-years old at that time -- my brother had to replace mamas when it was 70-years old. Both mixers were made when Hobart still owned the brand. I can not say I am impressed with the current ownership of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R. Brix

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Kitchenaid for the best coffee maker I have ever had......really. I have had every one I think over my life time...but yours is perfect. What I love? Size, 12 cups....water tower is super easy to fill and clean. Love the cone filter system, hot plate with auto off. You can program it, make your coffee stronger, I can't think of anything I don't like. Also easy to clean everything. Thanks.....BRAVO!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Great brew; only warms for two hours though
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker; flavor is great, and no filter changing is a plus over the last model. Brews quickly. I would give it a 5 star rating if it kept the coffee warmer going longer than two hours, but it doesn’t (and the manual doesn’t have a way to change that either.), so that’s the reason it only gets four stars. Otherwise, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: tryintobealittlemoreecomama

customer_reviews.title: Plastic taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned six different times once with vinegar. I couldn’t get rid of the plastic taste and smell. Returned coffeemaker for refund!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Schodowski

customer_reviews.title: Coffee maker had been used before!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Have this as a Christmas gift. Daughter opened to use after I gave it to her and it had coffee grounds in it so it had obviously been used before!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for 6 days and the glass pot has already shattered. It was barely bumped putting water into it on the sink. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie1922

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about a chemical smell I almost didn’t buy this. I drink a ton of coffee and would prefer to use the French press everyday but time does not allow so I need a coffee pot. My ninja broke and I wanted something different. I like that this is on its side and looks different in some way. When I received it I washed every part and ran water through it twice. No bad taste or smell. I would do that even if I didn’t read reviews like that. If you want a good coffee pot for a decent price this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT nice, not the best
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT a nice coffee machine. It is not the best, but it works mehhhh not well. I was expecting more from KitchenAid. You can definitely find a cheaper machine with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase - Glass Carafe breaks and Kitchenaid can't send a new one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee maker - however, the glass carafe shatters. I thought it was just me, so I purchased a second one and within a couple of months it had shattered as well. I called Kitchenaid and they were happy to send a replacement, however they are conveniently backordered with no ETA. The customer service takes an hour to get through to and they are not helpful. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Worked okay for a little over a month, just outside the return/refund window and then the carafe broke on the bottom. It was not dropped or hit against anything. Hot coffee pouring out everywhere. Kitchenaid will only cover a replacement carafe OR coffee maker but both are on indefinite back-order so you won’t get it anytime soon. Even if you do, it’s the same bad product and will break again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through a string of bad coffee machines that didn't function well, so we decided it was time to upgrade. So far this is the BEST one we have had! Love the removable carafe, sturdy reusable filter, pot that doesn't drip when you pour (!!!) user-friendly controls, and most importantly, delicious brews.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This thing is trash.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a year ago, a couple months it worked great then started not brewing a full pot. Now it is brewing 8 oz and shuts off and I have to babysit it to get it to keep brewing. I paid too much for a coffee pot I now have to replace less than a year later. I really expected better from Kitchenaid.
customer_reviews.author: Mason, Like The Jar

customer_reviews.title: Only one issue.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! It’s my best coffee pot yet. Worth the price. The one bummer is the pot lid doesn’t come off for easy cleaning. My other pots I would put in the dishwasher and this one you have to wash by hand. Other than that, I love love love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: We really like this machine
customer_reviews.text: We had to get a new coffee maker because our old one didn't fit under the cabinets in our new home. This simple, sleek machine looks great, is easy to clean, easy to brew with and I love the removable water tower
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It makes decent coffee but has several flaws in my opinion. It is important to keep your equipment clean in order to make reliably good coffee but the pot is awkward to wash, and am fairly certain I will break it soon. It is also a little difficult to get the brew basket to seat properly after removal and cleaning. Finally, for the life of me cannot figure out how to turn off the high-pitched beep the machine makes when brew starts/finishes--our place is small and although not super loud it is enough to wake people up....
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst designs I've ever seen in a coffee maker. Tank has this stupid slide design that is hard to line-up. Baskets have some kind of puzzle mechanism that makes it hard to put together and remove easily. Main basket has a hole that "hides" water after washing. Gold basket is such a bad filter that coffee is undeniable near the bottom of each cup. Terrible design...!
customer_reviews.author: R. Voller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee addict & mom on the run At least a pot a day. EVERY DAY. The timer/clock works perfectly. It is beautiful. The stong brew works great. So far i have not have had any issues other reviewer's have had.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker! It is reasonably priced, attractively designed and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Morton

customer_reviews.title: Love It !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything about this coffee maker. the only thing i would change would be the on and off switch on the front. When you move the maker around sometimes i hit the switch and it comes on without me realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Love the design but BAD coffee
customer_reviews.text: We grind our coffee fresh and this coffee maker does not do it justice. Unfortunately after the first few batches coffee tasted burnt and was not good. Also has auto shut off after two hours you can not turn off.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker so much. The coffee tastes amazing and it’s easy to get the perfect pot of coffee brewing. Not only does it make delicious coffee but it looks gorgeous too. Some coffee makers are an eyesore, but this one is sleek and gorgeous. Also the price can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We had this coffee maker a week and the carafe cracked where the metal band from the handle goes around it. Tried to order a new carafe and it says back order with no know date that they will be in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: We are totally coffee snobs. We like rich, bold coffee. We had out last coffeemaker for 20 or so years. It finally gave out. This delivers of taste and ease to use. It is programmable. I really like the water well. It is easy to pour water into or to remove and add water, which is really nice when entertaining and making large batches. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee maker, hate that it stopped working after 5 months to the day. Too late to return to amazon, but KitchenAid will send me a new one (in a diff color, unfortunately). The 1 yr warranty with KitchenAid is legit and their customer service was easy and helpful. I’ll update if the new one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: KrisLynne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new coffee pot because my Ninja Coffee bar broke. This time I just wanted a basic coffee pot but not a cheap one that would die on me in a year. I have made coffee a few times now in this pot and I feel it tastes way better than my Ninja Coffee bar coffee ever tasted and I'm using the same exact coffee. I like the look of the coffee pot and I like that it is easy to use. I also love the reusable filter because I don't want to buy paper filters all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Product had great reviews so we chose it. The smell that comes with the product takes a long time to disappear even with proper washing and running water through it and vinegar. The unit gets excessively hot underneath it and the coffee is not anything that special. If I had known all of this I would not have wasted my money. Takes up a large amount of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Staci White

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot all around!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality coffee pot. Bought it for my sister for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. I will definitely be buying one for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Too much Plastic
customer_reviews.text: If you want to eat less plastic this item is not for you! I washed and dried the removable parts several times in warm soapy water. I even soaked in warm soapy water. I Used the filter that came with the coffee maker and then tried a paper filter as well. Could not get rid of the plasticky smell and it made my coffee taste like plastic as well! If you are not concerned with taste or flavor of your coffee, the coffee maker performs well. It is easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months of use. Reaching out to manufacturer to see what they can do for me. Will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bruneman

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy - Typical KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well made. Only negative (and it might not be a negative for everyone depending on kitchen size) is that it's quite large. Makes great coffee, and I like the way it doesn't dribble when you pour.
customer_reviews.author: J. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy one
customer_reviews.text: Can not turn on burner after it has timed out
customer_reviews.author: Keith Howell

customer_reviews.title: This was a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best drip coffee maker I've owned. The coffee tastes really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Carafe broke after a week can't keep warm after 2 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Christi Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: This is for home use. Bought for the removable water tank which is a nice feature. Only wish it would have been available in black.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best coffer maker I have ever owned. It does everything I wanted in a coffee maker. It has a removable water reservoir which makes filling it and cleaning it fantastic. It is so easy to wipe the inside dry so that the inside is as clean as can be. It makes great coffee and keeps it hot. It is not flimsy like so many others. I would only wish that it came in white but it is so wonderful that I am letting that go.
customer_reviews.author: ce

customer_reviews.title: No Replacement Parts Available
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic coffee maker, until you break the carafe. There are no replacements. BUYER BEWARE. Barely bumped it on the counter and it shattered. Loved it for the 3 months we got to use it. Read reviews on Kitchenaid before purchasing, you've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love having the auto setting. I had to run it at least 5 times before use to get rid of the plastic smell! But its been perfect since then
customer_reviews.author: Kaytrina Bertsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee maker,was bought as a gift ,dad uses it almost everyday. The removeable water tank is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda disappointed. I should of thought about the controls on the side. Takes you more counter room when you keep it turned to the side. I bit bulky. It’s just ok, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I love the new matte gray color. The coffee pot is easy to use and we are really enjoying it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: laurie mullins

customer_reviews.title: Carafe won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker is great. Carafe that it comes with is crap, brittle, thin glass, barely tapped it on the sink when washing it and it shattered into 100 pieces, lasted 2 days and is impossible to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed
customer_reviews.text: The grey is really sharp, the carafe pours nicely, easy to fill with the removable tank.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Stylish look and great tasting coffee!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the coffee chef in our house. He loves this design and we all love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: mmussori

customer_reviews.title: Great machine in form and function
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee maker. Does very well without paper filters. Looks great as well
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My old coffee maker died, and this was the best choice I could have made. It's easy to use, and my coffee came out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LaToya S Alexander

customer_reviews.title: It’s coffee
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. Just wish we could take apart kettle to wash a d dry much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Presley

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this product !!
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 weeks and coffee maker stopped! Tried running water as pre directions, nothing. Packed up to return and amazon would not take back. Done
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Ali

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 12 cup drip coffee maker (matte charcoal grey)
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker, sleek design, heavy duty on countertop and love the spout of the 12 cup and sleek look. The only somewhat dislike is the lid to the water container - it does not lift up - you have to take it off every time but overall we really like.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee and looks awesome on the counter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee pot for my daughter and she absolutely loves it and it looks beautiful in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Byron

customer_reviews.title: Great looking simple coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Great simple coffee maker. Can be a *lottle* annoying to clean the gold filter over the paper ones but that’s a small nit pick. Otherwise, looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: The number of cups on the pot don’t match up with the water container. It’s not a deal breaker. Coffee tastes great. It’s nice to have a pot that can be turned and still useful. Grey is a great color.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KCM1208OB Drip Coffee Maker, 12 Cup, Onyx Black
product_meta.description: Color:Onyx BlackBrew delicious drip Coffee, every time. This 12 Cup drip Coffee maker, with spiral showerhead, allows you to brew delicious Coffee, every time. It evenly saturates Coffee grounds for optimal extraction, producing an exceptionally flavorful cup of Coffee. Also, this Coffee maker also features a variable brew strength Selector to choose between regular and bold strengths, 24 hour programmability, so your Coffee can be ready at any time, day or night, and a pause and pour feature to pour a cup of Coffee before the brewing is complete.

Dosage ladder on the gold tone filter and dosage chart on the water tank
Clear, easy to fill removable water tank with large opening to minimize spills
Convenient warming plate to keep coffee at the perfect temperature up to 2 hours
2 brew buttons (side, front) to place the brewer anyway you like on the countertop
Unique spout design on the glass carafe helps prevent drips and messes
